# symbol-tx-relayer server

## Endpoint

### POST `/claim`

request

```json
{
  "transaction": {
    "transaction":{"type":16724,"network":152,"version":38913,"maxFee":"0","deadline":"8954807077","signature":"","recipientAddress":{"address":"TAVZFM5O2437PCW7MDYTE23LCCYTOUB73P7LRWXD","networkType":152},"mosaics":[{"amount":"1","id":"51A99028058245A8"}],"message":{"type":0,"payload":""}}
  },
  "publicKey": "19C08117B826E6F155FC28FF4261912ACB7343572E935180B070EA8FD8404DCB"
}
```

response

```json
{
  "payload": "",
  "hash": "CB48C8B41441C9F321EA491365ABDBDC712CFA10CFEBE99488393BAAC8496CB6",
  "signerPublicKey": "5F247764C644A8A0A0E041115547AC8E0CC5F9ECB42C40E75C683C1D13F1E79D",
  "type": 16705,
  "networkType": 152
}
```

### POST `/sign`

request

```json
{
  "signature": "2879DE1383EF60810E30B4F563B7CCA420B195FF2D202097560F1ACCE6B70CE5BE05037CE82D382BD3DE51FF0586E40172EEBD828412A26847CB367439495B09",
  "parentHash": "0DFA2DB4DE84F9B1C3B8C6D8E9AA671D68B05499AF3E4B4CAA4B9D66942D8245",
  "publicKey": "19C08117B826E6F155FC28FF4261912ACB7343572E935180B070EA8FD8404DCB"
}
```

response

```json
{
  "message": "packet 9 was pushed to the network via /transaction"
}
```

## Getting Started

### Node.js

create and set `.env`

```shell script
npm run dev
```

### AWS Lambda

set env

- BUCKET_NAME
- GENERATION_HASH
- MOSAIC_ID
- PRIVATE_KEY
- REST_URL

set handler

- `lambda.handler`
